mapper.insert: insert into tbl01 (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl01 set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl01 where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
